title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and oil cloth covered kepi with canteen] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union uniform and oil cloth covered kepi with canteen] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 9.5 x 8.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 1-56. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (D 062). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
